name: ZBM
description:
Do you have confidence in the sense of rhythm?
ZBM is waiting for your challenge. Meet the amazing world of ZBM (ZODIAC BOXMETRY) to help you in finding your thrill.

Touch the 3D retro box by matching the beat of world EDM music of EDM beat. Bursting of boxes by touching with your fingertips can make your experience more thrilling.

Simple but the stage evolves as you grow-up, based on a simple rule of bursting a box in front of your eyes matching to the beats. It is simple but one cannot be careless.

By the modified rule of arcade mode you can look at the highest score of arcade mode and the crash mode. You can find the variety of games mode which is beyond the imagination. In addition, you can play game with your friend through crash mode.

New content will continue to be released.

For inquiries about games, please contact at the following address.

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/izzlegames
E-mail : contact@izzle.kr
